text: haey pitabrakd nasa knongchamnaom puok anak mean anak bangaebangaong( min chng chenhtow thveusangkream) . haey brasenbae kroh thnak ban kaetlaeng champoh puok anak(breachy ryy trauv ke samleab) ke nung niyeay tha a l laoh pitchea ban bratan nie k meat dl khnhom pi proh khnhom minban tow chaulruom thveusangkream cheamuoy puokke
